bio:treatment.description: Plants perennial; cespitose. Culms wiry, somewhat compressed, erect. Ligules less than 0.4 mm, membranous. Panicles narrow, with a few spikelets; branches appressed; pedicels short, with a few long hairs at the apices. Lower glumes 1- or 3-veined; lower florets sterile; lower paleas small; upper florets smooth, shiny, x = 10.
